items.sentence: Mary celebrates New Year's Day with her family.
Tom doesn't have to explain everything to Mary.
Tom met Mary just last week for the first time.
Tom got arrested in Boston yesterday afternoon.
Tom got shot while robbing a convenience store.
Tom got arrested for driving without a license.
Tom got arrested by an off-duty police officer.
Tom and Mary found a baby on their front porch.
Buy land. I hear they aren't making it anymore.
It seems that the rainy season is finally over.
Are you sure you want to walk home in the dark?
Are you sure you want to put that on the stove?
Are you sure you want to live with your father?
Are you sure you want to work for that company?
I wasn't able to hold onto the rope any longer.
Tom entered the room, holding a sheet of paper.
Tom goes to see Mary in the hospital every day.
Drink as much as you want. I'm driving tonight.
Even police officers sometimes drink and drive.
Tom seemed scared to admit that he didn't know.
